## Description {#details}

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sys/memory">Memory</a> legalizer - implements memory model.

More information can be found here: <a href="http://llvm.org/docs/AMDGPUUsage.html#memory-model">http://llvm.org/docs/AMDGPUUsage.html#memory-model</a>

<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><span class="doxyHighlight">      this-&gt;IsCrossAddressSpaceOrdering = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Limit the scope to the maximum supported by the instruction&#39;s address</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// spaces.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ((InstrAddrSpace &amp; ~<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-simemorylegalizer-cpp-/#a468bcaf55f58682520bae3261b54cc95a445a0aadad9b9505d6277348cd05da2c">SIAtomicAddrSpace::SCRATCH</a>) ==</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-simemorylegalizer-cpp-/#a468bcaf55f58682520bae3261b54cc95ab50339a10e1de285ac99d4c3990b8693">SIAtomicAddrSpace::NONE</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ((InstrAddrSpace &amp;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1056"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Set L1 cache policy to be MISS&#95;EVICT for load instructions</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1057"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// and MISS&#95;LRU for store instructions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1058"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Note: there is no L2 cache bypass policy at the ISA level.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1059"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a> == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-simemorylegalizer-cpp-/#a7d1379b61882d548830c6e5b216942a9a615d2885ef7576cedd9aafbb2578f028">SIMemOp::LOAD</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1060"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/groups/arcopt/#gaa57b1a4e6a1c79233913139635169cf1">Changed</a> |= <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-simemorylegalizer-cpp-/sigfx6cachecontrol/#a7bf4a0d22d0350c9acb245bce6a29ba6">enableGLCBit</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1061"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1062"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Ensure operation has completed at system scope to cause all volatile</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1063"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// operations to be visible outside the program in a global order. Do not</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1064"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// request cross address space as only the global address space can be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1065"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// observable outside the program, so no need to cause a waitcnt for LDS</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1066"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// address space operations.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1067"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/groups/arcopt/#gaa57b1a4e6a1c79233913139635169cf1">Changed</a> |= <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-simemorylegalizer-cpp-/sigfx6cachecontrol/#af78f627db81fe741605f4d60420ba145">insertWait</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-simemorylegalizer-cpp-/#a3a7d6d0a72ccf09bee528f6baa0bf974afa177138f94a7ea01f549b1aa7893d03">SIAtomicScope::SYSTEM</a>, AddrSpace, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01394" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1394"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Only handle load and store, not atomic read-modify-write insructions. The</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01396" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1396"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// be used for cache control.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01397" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1397"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>-&gt;mayLoad() ^ <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>-&gt;mayStore());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01398" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1398"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01399" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1399"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Only update load and store, not LLVM IR atomic read-modify-write</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01400" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1400"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// instructions. The latter are always marked as volatile so cannot sensibly</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01401" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1401"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// handle it as do not want to pessimize all atomics. Also they do not support</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01402" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1402"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the nontemporal attribute.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01403" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1403"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a> == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-simemorylegalizer-cpp-/#a7d1379b61882d548830c6e5b216942a9a615d2885ef7576cedd9aafbb2578f028">SIMemOp::LOAD</a> || <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a> == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-simemorylegalizer-cpp-/#a7d1379b61882d548830c6e5b216942a9a3cfba54f6873dfd55b0b09d32910b20e">SIMemOp::STORE</a>);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01408" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1408"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Set L1 cache policy to be MISS&#95;EVICT for load instructions</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01409" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1409"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// and MISS&#95;LRU for store instructions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01410" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1410"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Note: there is no L2 cache bypass policy at the ISA level.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01411" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1411"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a> == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-simemorylegalizer-cpp-/#a7d1379b61882d548830c6e5b216942a9a615d2885ef7576cedd9aafbb2578f028">SIMemOp::LOAD</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01412" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1412"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/groups/arcopt/#gaa57b1a4e6a1c79233913139635169cf1">Changed</a> |= <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-simemorylegalizer-cpp-/sigfx6cachecontrol/#a7bf4a0d22d0350c9acb245bce6a29ba6">enableGLCBit</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01413" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1413"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01414" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1414"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Ensure operation has completed at system scope to cause all volatile</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01415" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1415"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// operations to be visible outside the program in a global order. Do not</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01416" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1416"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// request cross address space as only the global address space can be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01417" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1417"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// observable outside the program, so no need to cause a waitcnt for LDS</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01418" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1418"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// address space operations.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01480" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1480"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">switch</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Scope) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01481" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1481"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-simemorylegalizer-cpp-/#a3a7d6d0a72ccf09bee528f6baa0bf974afa177138f94a7ea01f549b1aa7893d03">SIAtomicScope::SYSTEM</a>:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01482" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1482"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Ensures that following loads will not see stale remote VMEM data or</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01483" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1483"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// stale local VMEM data with MTYPE NC. Local VMEM data with MTYPE RW and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01484" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1484"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// CC will never be stale due to the local memory probes.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01485" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1485"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a17e04afcf0c5efeb0eb6a9a45287b5e4">BuildMI</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-simemorylegalizer-cpp-/sicachecontrol/#a130c7591df8c5cec4f5326a210be3a3a">TII</a>-&gt;get(AMDGPU::BUFFER&#95;INVL2));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01486" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1486"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Inserting a &quot;S&#95;WAITCNT vmcnt(0)&quot; after is not required because the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01487" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1487"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// hardware does not reorder memory operations by the same wave with</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01488" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1488"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// respect to a preceding &quot;BUFFER&#95;INVL2&quot;. The invalidate is guaranteed to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01489" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1489"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// remove any cache lines of earlier writes by the same wave and ensures</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01490" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1490"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// later reads by the same wave will refetch the cache lines.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01491" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1491"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/groups/arcopt/#gaa57b1a4e6a1c79233913139635169cf1">Changed</a> = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01492" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1492"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01493" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1493"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-simemorylegalizer-cpp-/#a3a7d6d0a72ccf09bee528f6baa0bf974a355e2c58b95170df578b37fc88eadcac">SIAtomicScope::AGENT</a>:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01494" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1494"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Same as GFX7.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01495" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1495"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01496" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1496"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-simemorylegalizer-cpp-/#a3a7d6d0a72ccf09bee528f6baa0bf974af7464491a3fc676a9c74fee700dd2973">SIAtomicScope::WORKGROUP</a>:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01497" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1497"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// In threadgroup split mode the waves of a work-group can be executing on</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01498" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1498"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// different CUs. Therefore need to invalidate the L1 which is per CU.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01499" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1499"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Otherwise in non-threadgroup split mode all waves of a work-group are</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01500" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1500"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// on the same CU, and so the L1 does not need to be invalidated.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01501" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1501"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-simemorylegalizer-cpp-/sicachecontrol/#a31e7caf93ea45b3d39743fbbe2e66605">ST</a>.isTgSplitEnabled()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01502" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1502"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Same as GFX7 using agent scope.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01503" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1503"><span class="doxyHighlight">        Scope = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-simemorylegalizer-cpp-/#a3a7d6d0a72ccf09bee528f6baa0bf974a355e2c58b95170df578b37fc88eadcac">SIAtomicScope::AGENT</a>;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01597" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1597"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-simemorylegalizer-cpp-/#a3a7d6d0a72ccf09bee528f6baa0bf974af7464491a3fc676a9c74fee700dd2973">SIAtomicScope::WORKGROUP</a>:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01598" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1598"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// In threadgroup split mode the waves of a work-group can be executing on</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01599" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1599"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// different CUs. Therefore need to bypass the L1 which is per CU.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01600" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1600"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Otherwise in non-threadgroup split mode all waves of a work-group are</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01601" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1601"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// on the same CU, and so the L1 does not need to be bypassed. Setting SC</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01680" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1680"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// RMW atomic operations implicitly bypass the L1 cache and only use SC1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01681" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1681"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to indicate system or agent scope. The SC0 bit is used to indicate if</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01683" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1683"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// scope.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01684" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1684"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01685" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1685"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">default</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01697" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1697"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// latter use glc to indicate if the atomic returns a result and so must not</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01698" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1698"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// be used for cache control.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01699" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1699"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>-&gt;mayLoad() ^ <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>-&gt;mayStore());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01700" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1700"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01701" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1701"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Only update load and store, not LLVM IR atomic read-modify-write</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01749" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1749"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">switch</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Scope) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01750" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1750"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-simemorylegalizer-cpp-/#a3a7d6d0a72ccf09bee528f6baa0bf974afa177138f94a7ea01f549b1aa7893d03">SIAtomicScope::SYSTEM</a>:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01751" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1751"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Ensures that following loads will not see stale remote VMEM data or</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01752" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1752"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// stale local VMEM data with MTYPE NC. Local VMEM data with MTYPE RW and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01753" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1753"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// CC will never be stale due to the local memory probes.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01754" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1754"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a17e04afcf0c5efeb0eb6a9a45287b5e4">BuildMI</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-simemorylegalizer-cpp-/sicachecontrol/#a130c7591df8c5cec4f5326a210be3a3a">TII</a>-&gt;get(AMDGPU::BUFFER&#95;INV))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01755" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1755"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Set SC bits to indicate system scope.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01756" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1756"><span class="doxyHighlight">          .<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstrbuilder/#a6c1f959947905135c7dd215b64957654">addImm</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu/cpol/#a7d79a4b341da8ac60b91c1f4b1ea42c4a39cdb386c8e6358db46b658828960381">AMDGPU::CPol::SC0</a> | <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu/cpol/#a7d79a4b341da8ac60b91c1f4b1ea42c4a4690b39a9275d5b009ecf78b08cfd27c">AMDGPU::CPol::SC1</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01757" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1757"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Inserting a &quot;S&#95;WAITCNT vmcnt(0)&quot; after is not required because the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01758" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1758"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// hardware does not reorder memory operations by the same wave with</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01759" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1759"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// respect to a preceding &quot;BUFFER&#95;INV&quot;. The invalidate is guaranteed to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01760" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1760"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// remove any cache lines of earlier writes by the same wave and ensures</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01761" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1761"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// later reads by the same wave will refetch the cache lines.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01762" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1762"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/groups/arcopt/#gaa57b1a4e6a1c79233913139635169cf1">Changed</a> = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01763" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1763"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01764" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1764"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-simemorylegalizer-cpp-/#a3a7d6d0a72ccf09bee528f6baa0bf974a355e2c58b95170df578b37fc88eadcac">SIAtomicScope::AGENT</a>:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01765" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1765"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Ensures that following loads will not see stale remote date or local</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01766" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1766"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// MTYPE NC global data. Local MTYPE RW and CC memory will never be stale</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01767" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1767"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// due to the memory probes.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01768" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1768"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a17e04afcf0c5efeb0eb6a9a45287b5e4">BuildMI</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-simemorylegalizer-cpp-/sicachecontrol/#a130c7591df8c5cec4f5326a210be3a3a">TII</a>-&gt;get(AMDGPU::BUFFER&#95;INV))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01769" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1769"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Set SC bits to indicate agent scope.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01770" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1770"><span class="doxyHighlight">          .<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstrbuilder/#a6c1f959947905135c7dd215b64957654">addImm</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu/cpol/#a7d79a4b341da8ac60b91c1f4b1ea42c4a4690b39a9275d5b009ecf78b08cfd27c">AMDGPU::CPol::SC1</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01771" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1771"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Inserting &quot;S&#95;WAITCNT vmcnt(0)&quot; is not required because the hardware</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01772" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1772"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// does not reorder memory operations with respect to preceeding buffer</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01773" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1773"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// invalidate. The invalidate is guaranteed to remove any cache lines of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01774" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1774"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// earlier writes and ensures later writes will refetch the cache lines.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01775" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1775"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/groups/arcopt/#gaa57b1a4e6a1c79233913139635169cf1">Changed</a> = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01776" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1776"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01777" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1777"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-simemorylegalizer-cpp-/#a3a7d6d0a72ccf09bee528f6baa0bf974af7464491a3fc676a9c74fee700dd2973">SIAtomicScope::WORKGROUP</a>:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01778" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1778"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// In threadgroup split mode the waves of a work-group can be executing on</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01779" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1779"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// different CUs. Therefore need to invalidate the L1 which is per CU.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01780" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1780"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Otherwise in non-threadgroup split mode all waves of a work-group are</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01781" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1781"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// on the same CU, and so the L1 does not need to be invalidated.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01782" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1782"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-simemorylegalizer-cpp-/sicachecontrol/#a31e7caf93ea45b3d39743fbbe2e66605">ST</a>.isTgSplitEnabled()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01783" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1783"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Ensures L1 is invalidated if in threadgroup split mode. In</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01784" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1784"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// non-threadgroup split mode it is a NOP, but no point generating it in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01785" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1785"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// that case if know not in that mode.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01794" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1794"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2196"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#ae34c996b58df9b9ce6695a0c8b70c533">MachineBasicBlock::iterator</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-simemorylegalizer-cpp-/#a468bcaf55f58682520bae3261b54cc95">SIAtomicAddrSpace</a> AddrSpace, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-simemorylegalizer-cpp-/#a7d1379b61882d548830c6e5b216942a9">SIMemOp</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2197"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> IsVolatile, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> IsNonTemporal, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> IsLastUse = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">)</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2198"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2199"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Only handle load and store, not atomic read-modify-write insructions. The</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2200"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// latter use glc to indicate if the atomic returns a result and so must not</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2201"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// be used for cache control.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2202"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>-&gt;mayLoad() ^ <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>-&gt;mayStore());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2203"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2204"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Only update load and store, not LLVM IR atomic read-modify-write</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2205"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// instructions. The latter are always marked as volatile so cannot sensibly</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2206"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// handle it as do not want to pessimize all atomics. Also they do not support</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2207"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the nontemporal attribute.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2208"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a> == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-simemorylegalizer-cpp-/#a7d1379b61882d548830c6e5b216942a9a615d2885ef7576cedd9aafbb2578f028">SIMemOp::LOAD</a> || <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a> == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-simemorylegalizer-cpp-/#a7d1379b61882d548830c6e5b216942a9a3cfba54f6873dfd55b0b09d32910b20e">SIMemOp::STORE</a>);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02369" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2369"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Acquire sequences only need to wait on the previous atomic operation.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02370" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2370"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// e.g. a typical sequence looks like</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02371" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2371"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    atomic load</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02372" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2372"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    (wait)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02373" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2373"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    global&#95;inv</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02374" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2374"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02375" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2375"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We do not have BVH or SAMPLE atomics, so the atomic load is always going</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02376" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2376"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to be tracked using loadcnt.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02377" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2377"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02378" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2378"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This also applies to fences. Fences cannot pair with an instruction</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02379" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2379"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// tracked with bvh/samplecnt as we don&#39;t have any atomics that do that.</span></CodeLine>
